duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and clarify business or product questions and provide feedback to translate and refine them into tractable analysis or models.
Be responsible for gathering, extracting, and compiling data across sources, and ensure the data is ready for analysis.
Design and evaluate models to solve defined problems with limited precedent, using specialized knowledge and custom data infrastructure.
Gather information, business goals, priorities, and organizational context around the questions to answer, as well as the existing and upcoming data infrastructure.
Use custom data infrastructure or existing data models as appropriate, using specialized knowledge.
Independently format, re-structure, and/or validate data to ensure quality, and review the dataset to ensure it is ready for analysis.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, Operations Research, Engineering, or a related quantitative field.

5 years of work experience using analytics to solve product or business problems, coding (e.g., Python, R, SQL), querying databases or statistical analysis, or 3 years of work experience with a PhD degree.
